content: Hi! I’m working as a postdoc at Aalto University Acoustics Lab. My research concerns human perception of speech and music in reverberant spaces, including such aspects as listening effort and the effects of hearing impairment.
summary: Hi! I’m working as a postdoc at Aalto University Acoustics Lab. My research concerns human perception of speech and music in reverberant spaces, including such aspects as listening effort and the effects of hearing impairment.
title: Antti Kuusinen
